airtrafficcontrol.app.utils

Class Airship

  • java.lang.Object
    • airtrafficcontrol.app.utils.Airship
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CivilAirplane, MilitaryAirplane

    public abstract class Airship
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class whose subclasses' instances represent airships.
    Author:
    Eva Gomes, Hugo Leal, Lucas Andrade

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int numberOfMinutesToLand
      The number of minutes the airship has to land so that when he abandons the current established air corridor, this occurrence will not be reported as an error.
      int numberOfMinutesToSwitchCorridor
      The number of minutes the airship has to switch from an established altitude corridor to next one established.
      int numberOfMinutesToTakeOff
      The number of minutes the airship has to take-off and reach the first air corridor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Airship(java.lang.String flightID, GeographicalPosition statingPosition, FlightPlan flightPlan)
      Constructs an airplane with the ID flightID, the take off coordinates statingPostition and the flight plan flightPlan.

    • Field Detail

      • numberOfMinutesToTakeOff

        public int numberOfMinutesToTakeOff
        The number of minutes the airship has to take-off and reach the first air corridor.

      • numberOfMinutesToLand

        public int numberOfMinutesToLand
        The number of minutes the airship has to land so that when he abandons the current established air corridor, this occurrence will not be reported as an error.

      • numberOfMinutesToSwitchCorridor

        public int numberOfMinutesToSwitchCorridor
        The number of minutes the airship has to switch from an established altitude corridor to next one established.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Airship

        public Airship(java.lang.String flightID,
               GeographicalPosition statingPosition,
               FlightPlan flightPlan)
        throws InvalidArgumentException
        Constructs an airplane with the ID flightID, the take off coordinates statingPostition and the flight plan flightPlan. Also creates a structure to save the airship's last known geographical positions.
        Parameters:
        flightID - The flight's ID.
        statingPosition - The coordinates where the airship will take-off.
        flightPlan - The plan of the flight.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - If flightID, statingPosition or flightPlan are null.

    • Method Detail

      • getFlightID

        public java.lang.String getFlightID()
        Returns:
        the ID of the plane

      • getGeographicPosition

        public GeographicalPosition getGeographicPosition()
        Returns:
        the geographical position of the airplane

      • getLastKnownGeographicPosition

        public java.lang.Object[] getLastKnownGeographicPosition()
        all the last known geographic positions of the aircraft
        Returns:
        an array of objects of type object, where all the known geographic positions of the aircraft are saved as GeographicalPosition objects

      • updateGeographicPosition

        public void updateGeographicPosition(GeographicalPosition newGeographicalPosition)
                              throws InvalidArgumentException
        Parameters:
        newGeographicalPosition - - updates the geographical position to a new one
        Throws:

      • getCurrentCorridor

        public AltitudeCorridor getCurrentCorridor()
        Returns:
        gets the corridor the airplane is planned to be in, at the time the method was called
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

      • setNewArrivalHour

        public void setNewArrivalHour(java.util.Calendar newArrivalHour)
                       throws InvalidArgumentException
        allows to set a new arrival time in case the airplane is running late
        Parameters:
        newArrivalHour - - the new planned hour for the arrival of the airplane in its destination
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

      • getPlan

        public FlightPlan getPlan()
        Returns:
        the flight plan of the airplane

      • getObservations

        public java.lang.String getObservations()
                                 throws InvalidArgumentException
        gets an observation on the state of the plane. A string is returned with the information whether the airplane is just cruising normally, switching corridors, gaining altitude after take off, or even making its descent
        Returns:
        a string with information on the status of the airplane
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

      • getTakeOffDate

        public java.util.Calendar getTakeOffDate()
        Returns:
        the date and hour the airplane is supposed to take off

      • getLandingDate

        public java.util.Calendar getLandingDate()
        Returns:
        the date and hour the airplane is supposed to land

      • wasPositionUpdated

        public boolean wasPositionUpdated()
        Returns:
        true if the position was updated since the last time positionToString() was called

      • positionToString

        public java.lang.String positionToString()
                                  throws InvalidArgumentException
        Returns:
        returns a string with the id, position, and observations about the airplane
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

      • setNumberOfMinutesToTakeOff

        public abstract void setNumberOfMinutesToTakeOff(int newTime)
                                          throws InvalidArgumentException
        sets a new number of minutes for the take off of this class' airplanes. this will affect all the airplanes of this type, that were already constructed and all that will be constructed in the future
        Parameters:
        newTime - - the new number of minutes this class of airplane needs to take off
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

      • setNumberOfMinutesToLand

        public abstract void setNumberOfMinutesToLand(int newTime)
                                       throws InvalidArgumentException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException
